skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Yuudachi! People call me the "Mad Dog of Solomon"! Heheh, I sound pretty strong, don't I? I'd never lose in a brawl! Hm? It's snack time? Commander, tell me where those snacks are!
skins.acquisition: I'm Yuudachi, fourth ship of the Shiratsuyu-class. I'll tell you this right now: I'm pretty loud at night, so brace yourself.
skins.login: Ugh, Commander... "Shake paws"?! Are you making fun of me?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, seriously, stop throwing that frisbee at me. I'm not a dog~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: *Sniff sniff* I smell meat! Where is it?! Tell me right now!
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's so boring when I don't get to fight... Commander, wanna have a go? Let's do it!
skins.secretaryTouch: Grr... Stop treating me like a kid.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Grr… I'll stuff you into guns and send you off to space, you damn molester!

skins.shipDescription: Look, Commander! Isn't this kimono thing all, like, red and white and cool? I dig it! ... But what occasion is it for?
skins.acquisition: Look, Commander! Isn't this kimono thing all, like, red and white and cool? I dig it! ... But what occasion is it for?
skins.login: Commander! Heheheh~! I knew it was you just from the way you smell!
skins.details: I dunno why, but wearing this makes me feel like I'm always by your side!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you busy? If not, can we play? We can play whatever you want!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh yeah, I tried making some food for you the other day, but I ended up wrecking the kitchen...
skins.secretaryIdle3: When there's nobody to fight, just gazing at you keeps boredom away... Doesn't keep sleepiness away, though...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander! Did I do something praiseworthy?! Heheheh~! Pat me, c'mon!

skins.shipDescription: Come out of your office, Commander! You'll become lazy if you huddle up next to the heater all day! Let's go out and play in the snow!
skins.acquisition: Come out of your office, Commander! You'll become lazy if you huddle up next to the heater all day! Let's go out and play in the snow!
skins.login: The hell you looking so sad for, Commander? C'mon, let's roll around in the snow together!
skins.details: It's cold? It doesn't feel cold at all to me!
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's too warm in here, it's making me sleepy... Mmmh... Commander... meat... so yummy...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Woof! Focus fire on the commander! Victory shall be mine!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Gotta eat hotpot during winter, right? Hotpot? Let's make some hotpot!
skins.secretaryTouch: Shiratsuyu, Shigure, let's have a snowball fight!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, look at me, look at me! What do you think of my new outfit? If you like it, wanna give it a feel?
skins.acquisition: Commander, look at me, look at me! What do you think of my new outfit? If you like it, wanna give it a feel?
skins.login: I heard there's gonna be a ton of meat at the banquet! I can't wait any longer!
skins.details: Commander, look, these are my spoils of war! Ahh, I'm so glad that there's so much delicious meat to chow down on at the banquet!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Erm, where'd Shigure go... I bet she went off to have one of her dumb contests with Yukikaze again!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I heard there's also going to be a ball tonight. Commander, how do you dance?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Be careful not to get my clothes dirty? Mhm, I already know! I really like this outfit too, so I'll take good care of it!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ehehe... Commander, are you taking me to get more delicious meat, or to have even more fun?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! I'm gonna get super mad!

skins.JPClientName: ドリ`ムクリスマスナイト
skins.shipDescription: “圣诞”就是那个“圣诞老人”会来送礼物的日子对吧！好期待啊~指挥官也是吧？也同样期待着礼物没错吧！
